articles.title: Video game maker Electronic Arts to be acquired and taken private for $55 billion
articles.description:
Electronic Arts, maker of video games like “Madden NFL," “Battlefield,” and “The Sims,” has been run by its current CEO, Andrew Wilson, since 2013.

The post Video game maker Electronic Arts to be acquired and taken private for $55 billion appeared first on Boston.com.
